definition: surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: Objective To explore the trituration and clinical application of compound suppository of lomefloxacin.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討洛美沙星栓研製方法和臨牀療效。

sentences.english: The contents of the lomefloxacin and tinidazole in the tablets were determined by dual wavelength spectrophotometry.
sentences.chinese: 採用雙波長法測定泡騰片中洛美沙星和替硝唑的含量。

sentences.english: Lomefloxacin and its capsules were determined by a modified HPLC method.
sentences.chinese: 改進了鹽酸洛美沙星及其膠囊的HPLC測定條件。

sentences.english: Aim To identify the structure of the new drug lomerizine dihydrochloride.
sentences.chinese: 目的用核磁共振方法鑑定新藥鹽酸洛美利嗪的結構。

sentences.english: AIM To investigate the photodegradation kinetic characteristics of lomefloxacin hydrochloride aqueous solution.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察鹽酸洛美沙星水溶液的光降解動力學特徵。

sentences.english: I am a native of Lome in Togo.
sentences.chinese: 我在多哥是一個洛美的本地人。

sentences.english: Mr. Shaw says the new center in Lome will open to students in March.
sentences.chinese: 肖先生說，在洛美新的中心將在三月的學生。

definition: (phonetic na)/used esp. in female names such as Anna 安娜[An1 na4] or Diana 黛安娜[Dai4 an1 na4]
(phonetic character used in transliteration of foreign names)/Taiwan pr. [li4]/variant of 璃[li2]
to receive blessings in a sincere spirit
